headers.subject: [tosdr:2909] Twitch [Info] ToService and ToSale different incorporation than privacy policy

subject: Twitch [Info] ToService and ToSale different incorporation than privacy policy
text:
http://www.twitch.tv/user/legal?page=terms_of_sale
http://www.twitch.tv/user/legal?page=terms_of_service
http://www.twitch.tv/user/legal?page=privacy_policy

The privacy policy says:
>  which sites, applications or services are operated or produced by Twitch Interactive, Inc. (“ Twitch ”).

while both ToS talk about:
> made available to you (“ you ” or “ User ”) by Justin.tv, Inc. dba Twitch

“dba” stands for “doing business as”

So strictly reading, they differ in the defined incorporation, which is a bit confusing.
“Twitch Interactive, Inc.” vs “Justin.tv, Inc. dba Twitch”
